#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,d,sum=0;
        cin>>n>>d;
        int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            sum+=a[i];
        }
        int res=sum+(n-1)*10;
        if(res>d)
            cout<<"-1"<<endl;
        else
        {
            cout<<(d-sum)/5<<endl;
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
